title: freeze process
extract: Freezing Definition: The process through which a substance changes from a liquid to a solid. All liquids except helium undergo freezing when the temperature becomes sufficiently cold.Mar 8, 2017
extract_html: Freezing Definition: The process through which a substance changes from a liquid to a solid. All liquids except helium undergo freezing when the temperature becomes sufficiently cold.Mar 8, 2017
